thread.title: Mr. John Broomfield
thread.title_full: Mikes Dive Store reviewed by Mr. John Broomfield

author: Mr. John Broomfield
title: Mr. John Broomfield
text:
I recently bought a number of small accessories from Mikes, ordering them online rather than travelling to the shop. Within an hour of placing my order, I received an email advising that one of the items was unavailable due to a manufacturers supply problem. During an exchange of emails, several alternatives were offered and discussed and eventually a substitution was made and the order completed. The quick response from Mikes meant that I lost no time in having my order delivered and still managed to buy everything I needed.
Good service as always.
